Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.diffs.lobby_lobbyList

Class LobbyDiffEdit

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.diffs.lobby_lobbyList.LobbyDiff
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.diffs.lobby_lobbyList.LobbyDiffEdit
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelDiffs<LightLobby>, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LobbyDiffEditLogin
public class LobbyDiffEdit extends LobbyDiff
This class represent an updated to the LightLobby of the client containing the nicknames of players who are joining and leaving it for a user who is already in the lobby
See Also:
